channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: Wimbledon 2025
channel.desc: Continued live coverage from Wimbledon, where the second round is taking place. Carlos Alcaraz and Jannik Sinner have shared the last six grand slams between them, and they will fancy their chances of extending that run. For Spaniard Alcaraz, it would mean a third consecutive Wimbledon title, while Italian Sinner would be lifting the cup here for the first time. Presented by Isa Guha.
